content: You just don’t like the term. What you are missing is that new products, regardless of their success or lack thereof, have been innovative, smart, clever, designed for manufacturing and for the end user. So if you don’t think so…..WTF are any one doing? You’ve got a computer, a car, fly in a jet….if those aren’t innovative in your mind….WTF is? And if I am missing your point….so be it.
